Articles.Content:
I just finished my most recent video on kerbal-parkour (I'll have to come up with an easier way to say that like Kerbal-kour or something ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)).

Now that climbing was introduced in 1.0 you can now climb the KSC satellite dishes! I'm not sure if it was possible before hand.

Enjoy~

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CIg-fdoWA5c?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
